name: @wpmudev/shared-ui
description: For internal use in WPMU DEV plugins
author: WPMU DEV

scripts.build:dev: gulp dev:styles && gulp dev:jsCopies && gulp dev:scripts
scripts.build:files: gulp update-version && npm run build:sui && npm run build:dev && gulp copy-files
scripts.watch:assets: npm run build:sui && npm run build:dev && gulp watch
scripts.release:same: npm run build:files && npm run publish:dev && npm run publish:sui && npm run publish:npm
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm run build:files && npm run publish:dev && npm run publish:sui && npm run publish:npm
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && npm run build:files && npm run publish:dev && npm run publish:sui && npm run publish:npm
scripts.release:major: npm version major --no-git-tag-version && npm run build:files && npm run publish:dev && npm run publish:sui && npm run publish:npm
